data.name: BackgroundChunks
data.value: Controls the amount of background chunks.

data.name: BackgroundSkips
data.value: Controls the amount of background skips.

data.name: BaseBrightness
data.value: Controls the brightness of the base color of the effect.

data.name: BaseColor
data.value: Controls the base color that will be used for the background of the effect.

data.name: Blend
data.value: Applies the gradient blend vertically.

data.name: Brightness
data.value: Controls the brightness of the effect.

data.name: ButterflyType
data.value: Controls the type of pattern.

data.name: CenterStop
data.value: Moves the text into view and stops it in the center.

data.name: CenterText
data.value: Center each line of text instead of left justified.

data.name: ChangePercent
data.value: Sets percentage of change.

data.name: Color
data.value: Controls the color of the effect.

data.name: ColorHandling
data.value: Controls how the color is handled.

data.name: ColorScheme
data.value: Controls the color scheme.

data.name: MinimumBrightness
data.value: Controls the default brightness of the background in the effect. Sometimes a zero value may be necesary to get certain behaviors in layer mixing.

data.name: Depth
data.value: Indicates how many levels deep the effect should be grouped.

data.name: DeviationPercent
data.value: Sets percent of deviation.

data.name: Direction
data.value: Controls the direction of the effect.

data.name: EffectType
data.value: Controls the type of movement.

data.name: Explosions
data.value: Controls how many explosions occur.

data.name: ExtendPulseEnd
data.value: Extends the pulse to the end of the effect from beyond it's normal ending position. The extension will be at the ending color and ending value of the brightness intensity. If the intensity ends in zero, this will have no effect.

data.name: ExtendPulseStart
data.value: Extends the pulse back to the start of the effect from it's normal starting position. The extension will be at the starting color and starting brightness intensity. If the intensity starts at zero, which is the default, this will have no effect.

data.name: Filename
data.value: The selected file name.

data.name: FitTime
data.value: Times the effect so that it will fit in the allotted time span.

data.name: FlakeCount
data.value: Controls the amount of flakes.

data.name: FlickerFrequency
data.value: Sets flicker frequency in changes per second.

data.name: FlickerPercent
data.value: Sets percentage of flicker.

data.name: Font
data.value: The text font.

data.name: GifSpeed
data.value: Controls the speed at which a gif animates if the image is a animated gif.

data.name: GradientLevelPair
data.value: Controls the color gradient and brightness curve that are associated together to provide the color(s) for the effect.

data.name: GradientMode
data.value: Controls how the gradient is applied to the effect.

data.name: GroupLevel
data.value: Controls the grouping together of elements that will be in the same state.

data.name: Grow
data.value: Grow the legs of the spiral.

data.name: Height
data.value: Controls the height of the fire.

data.name: Highlight
data.value: Controls whether there are highlights added.

data.name: HueShift
data.value: Controls the color of the fire.

data.name: Interval
data.value: Specifies how often the effect should switch in milliseconds.

data.name: IntervalSkip
data.value: Controls the offset into the color list for the alternate state in the effect. One is the default and would shift the colors back and forth by one.

data.name: Iterations
data.value: Controls the number of times the pattern repeats over the timespan.

data.name: Location
data.value: Controls the location.

data.name: MaxBrightness
data.value: Controls the maximum brightness of a pulse.

data.name: MinBrightness
data.value: Controls the minimum brightness of a pulse.

data.name: Orientation
data.value: Defines the direction of the strings and controls how the effect is oriented on the element.

data.name: ParticleFade
data.value: Controls how fast the particles fade.

data.name: Particles
data.value: Controls how many particles will be created.

data.name: PixelsPerString
data.value: The count of pixels on each string.

data.name: Position
data.value: Controls the centering of the text on the element.

data.name: PulseDuration
data.value: Controls how long each pulse is in milliseconds.

data.name: PulseOverlap
data.value: Controls how many milliseconds the individual pulses overlap.

data.name: PulseShape
data.value: Controls the individual pulse shape.

data.name: PulseSpinPercent
data.value: Controls how long each pulse is as a percentage of the spin.

data.name: PulseType
data.value: Controls how individual pulses are applied across the effect.

data.name: Repeat
data.value: Controls the number of times the color pattern repeats within the pattern.

data.name: RevolutionCount
data.value: Controls how many revolutions of the spin will occur.

data.name: RevolutionFrequency
data.value: Controls the frequency in Hz at which the spin occurs.

data.name: RevolutionTime
data.value: Controls the duration in milliseconds at which the spin occurs.

data.name: Rotation
data.value: The amount of twist in the spiral.

data.name: ScalePercent
data.value: Controls the percent of the scaling to reduce the size of large images to fit.

data.name: ScaleToGrid
data.value: Automatically sets the scaling to match the grid size.

data.name: Show3D
data.value: Adds a 3D effect.

data.name: Shrink
data.value: Shrink the legs of the spiral.

data.name: SpinSpeedFormat
data.value: Controls how the individual spins occur.

data.name: StaticColorIndicator
data.value: Indicates the color is a static color.

data.name: StaticEffect
data.value: Indicates that the effect should be the same on all elements.

data.name: StringCount
data.value: The count of strings the effect will use.

data.name: TargetPositioning
data.value: Determines how the target elements are treated. Either as individual strings or by their actual location.

data.name: TextBrightness
data.value: Controls the brightness of the text in the effect.

data.name: TextLines
data.value: The text to be displayed.

data.name: TextMode
data.value: Controls the orientation of the text lines.

data.name: Thickness
data.value: Controls how thick the spiral leg is.

data.name: TwinkleAvgPulseTime
data.value: Controls how long the averge pulse time is in the twinkle.

data.name: TwinkleCoverage
data.value: Controls how much of the effect by percent is covered in twinkles.

data.name: TwinkleDepth
data.value: Controls whether each individual element is twinkled independantly or controled by the depth of the effect.

data.name: TwinkleLevelVariation
data.value: Controls how much percent variation in the brightness level of each pulse in the twinkle.

data.name: TwinklePulseTimeVariation
data.value: Controls how much percent variation in the time of each pulse in the twinkle.

data.name: UseBaseColor
data.value: Indicates if a underlying base color should be used.

data.name: Velocity
data.value: Controls the velocity of the particles.

data.name: VerticalBlend
data.value: Changes the orientation of the gradient.

data.name: WipeCount
data.value: Controls the number of passes the wipe makes.

data.name: WipePulsePercent
data.value: Controls the length of the pulse as a percentage of the effect time.

data.name: WipeType
data.value: Controls how the wipe behaves. Either by a count of passes, or by time related to pulse length.

data.name: XOffset
data.value: Can help to adjust the position of the effect. May not work in all cases.

data.name: YOffset
data.value: Can help to adjust the position of the effect. May not work in all cases.

data.name: MeteorType
data.value: Colors are not used when Rainbow is selected.

data.name: GradientPosition
data.value: Controls the stop point for the color in the gradient.

data.name: FramesPerSecond
data.value: Controls the frames per second rate.

data.name: EnableMinimumBrightness
data.value: Enables a default brightness for the background in the effect. The background will be based on the foreground color selections.

data.name: BladeType
data.value: Determines the look of the blade.

data.name: AlternatingDepth
data.value: Controls whether each individual element is alternated independantly or controlled by the depth of the effect.

data.name: CenterHub
data.value: Configures the size of the hub or hole in the center of the Pinwheel.

data.name: Twist
data.value: Configures the amount of rotation or twist the Pinwheel arm has.

data.name: CenterX
data.value: Controls the center positioning of the effect in the horizontal plane.

data.name: CenterY
data.value: Controls the center positioning of the effect in the vertical plane.

data.name: RadiusCurve
data.value: The radius of the circle over the time of the effect.

data.name: WaveAcceleration
data.value: Controls how the wave accelerates out from the center over time.

data.name: WidthCurve
data.value: The width over time of the effect.

data.name: ColorType
data.value: Controls the Type of Color.

data.name: MaxMeteorAngle
data.value: Max angle the Meteor moves.

data.name: MinMeteorAngle
data.value: Min angle the Meteor moves.

data.name: MovementType
data.value: Controls how the effect progresses across time between speed or iterations.

data.name: RandomPosition
data.value: Creates new Meteors at a Random Position

data.name: RandomSpeed
data.value: Enables Random Speed settings.

data.name: TailLength
data.value: Controls the amount of TailLength.

data.name: SpeedVariation
data.value: Randomly adjust the Speed around the Speed level by the amount of variation.

data.name: FlakeType
data.value: Controls the type of snowflake.

data.name: Include45Pt
data.value: Include 45 Point Flakes.

data.name: MaxAngle
data.value: Max angle the Snowflake moves.

data.name: MaxDirection
data.value: Max Direction in Degrees.

data.name: MinAngle
data.value: Min angle the Snowflake moves.

data.name: MinDirection
data.value: Min Direction in Degrees.

data.name: RandomIntensity
data.value: Changes the Intensity for each element of the effect.

data.name: GarlandType
data.value: Changes the garland type.

data.name: Spacing
data.value: Adjusts the space between garlands.

data.name: ReverseDirection
data.value: Changes direction of effect.

data.name: Movement
data.value: Controls variance of the motion over time.

data.name: BorderType
data.value: Enable Single or Independent Border width control.

data.name: BorderMode
data.value: Enables Simple or Advanced border width control.

data.name: BorderWidth
data.value: Adjusts the Border width.

data.name: BottomBorderWidth
data.value: Adjust the Bottom Border Width.

data.name: LeftBorderWidth
data.value: Adjust the Left Border Width.

data.name: OuterBorderStarts
data.value: Adjusts the Outer border start location.

data.name: RightBorderWidth
data.value: Adjust the Right Border Width.

data.name: RoundEdges
data.value: Adds a pixel to the inner corners of the border.

data.name: TopBorderWidth
data.value: Adjust the Top Border Width.

data.name: BorderSize
data.value: Adjusts the overall size of the border.

data.name: BackGroundColor
data.value: Changes Background color.

data.name: BallCount
data.value: Controls the number of Balls displayed.

data.name: BallEdgeWidth
data.value: Width of the individual empty balls.

data.name: BallFill
data.value: Selects the type of fill for the balls.

data.name: BallType
data.value: Selects between Bounce and Wrap.

data.name: ChangeCollideColor
data.value: Change ball color when balls collide.

data.name: Collide
data.value: Change the ball direction when balls collide.

data.name: RandomRadius
data.value: Creates random size balls up to the Radius value..

data.name: BallSize
data.value: Size of the Ball.

data.name: CircleCount
data.value: Adjust the number of Circles or radial patterns in the effect.

data.name: CircleEdgeWidth
data.value: Width of the individual circles, may need to increase when using Loaction.

data.name: HorizontalOffset
data.value: Controls the center positioning of the effect in the horizontal plane.

data.name: RadialSpeed
data.value: Speed of the radial pattern.

data.name: Size
data.value: Size of the radial effect.

data.name: VerticalOffset
data.value: Controls the center positioning of the effect in the vertical plane.

data.name: CircleFill
data.value: Changes the way the circle is filled.

data.name: RadialDirection
data.value: Changes the direction of the effect to In or out.

data.name: SnowBuildUp
data.value: Allows the Snowflakes to build-up at the bottom of the Element.

data.name: InitialBuildUp
data.value: Sets the height level of the Initial Snow build-up at the bottom of the element.

data.name: BuildUpSpeed
data.value: Adjusts how fast the build-up of Snow is.

data.name: EnableGroundLevel
data.value: Adds a Ground level for the Meteors to hit.

data.name: Angle
data.value: Controls the rotation angle.

data.name: FontScale
data.value: Adjusts the Font size.

data.name: EyeMode
data.value: Determines how the eyes are handled.

data.name: LipSyncMode
data.value: Use a single Phoneme or collection of Marks with Phoneme labels.

data.name: LyricData
data.value: The lyric verbiage this Phoneme is associated with.

data.name: MappingType
data.value: The mapping type. Face Mapping or Image Map.

data.name: MarkCollection
data.value: The Mark Collection to align the phoneme movements with. This collection should have the phoneme names for labels.

data.name: PhonemeMapping
data.value: The map to use to associate phonemes with images.

data.name: ShowOutline
data.value: Detemines if the outline of the element is lit.

data.name: StaticPhoneme
data.value: The Phoneme mouth affiliation.

data.name: FireworksSource
data.value: Selects what source is used to determine explosions.

data.name: AutoFit
data.value: Adjusts the time the word is displayed to auto fit between words either side.

data.name: DirectionPerWord
data.value: When enabled will move the text basd on direction over the duration of each displayed word.

data.name: MarkLabels
data.value: Use Mark Labels as text to be displayed.

data.name: RepeatText
data.value: When enabled will repeat the individual words if there are more Marks in the collection then number of total words.

data.name: TextFade
data.value: Will fade the displayed text as per setting.

data.name: TextTrigger
data.value: Use standard Text with no external trigger, Marks to trigger when words are shown or Marks to trigger and use Mark Labels to display.

data.name: TextDuration
data.value: Adjusts the way the text duration is used.

data.name: TimeVisibleLength
data.value: Length of time in milliseconds the countdown is shown at each mark.

data.name: CountDownFade
data.value: Will fade each displayed count down time.

data.name: CountDownType
data.value: Sets the type as count down the time to the end of the effect, or count up/down from user specified start time.

data.name: TimeFormat
data.value: Displays the count down in Minutes (over 60sec) or second.

data.name: MarkTimeFreeze
data.value: Freezes on the tiem left when triggered.

data.name: CountDownTime
data.value: Sets the starting time in seconds for the count to begin.

data.name: AngleSpeed
data.value: Adjusts the angle speed of the shape.

data.name: AngleSpeedVariation
data.value: Randomly adjust the angle speed around the angle speed level by the amount of variation.

data.name: BorderShapes
data.value: Select from a list of Border shapes.

data.name: ChristmasShapes
data.value: Select from a list of Christmas shapes.

data.name: ColorFill
data.value: Fills the shape with the fill color.

data.name: CrossSizeRatio
data.value: Adjuts the cross Height to Width ratio.

data.name: FirstFillColors
data.value: Fills the shape.

data.name: GeometricShapes
data.value: Select from a list of Geometric shapes.

data.name: HalloweenShapes
data.value: Select from a list of Halloween shapes.

data.name: MaxShapeSize
data.value: Maximum Shape Size.

data.name: Mode
data.value: Controls shape movement.

data.name: OutlineColors
data.value: Adjusts the outline color.

data.name: PolygonSides
data.value: Adjusts number of Polygon sides.

data.name: RandomAngle
data.value: Randomly sets initial shape angle.

data.name: RandomShapeSize
data.value: Randomly sets initial shape size.

data.name: RoundedCorners
data.value: Add rounded corners to the Geometric shapes.

data.name: SecondFillColors
data.value: Fills the shape.

data.name: ShapeCount
data.value: Adjusts the number of shapes to be created.

data.name: ShapeOutLine
data.value: Adjusts the outline dash length of the shape, used with the line spacing.

data.name: ShapeOutLineSpace
data.value: Adjusts the outline space length between dashes of the shape, used with the dash length.

data.name: ShapeSize
data.value: Size of the shape.

data.name: ShapeSizeRatio
data.value: Adjust the Height to Width ratio.

data.name: ShapeType
data.value: Selects Shape catagory.

data.name: SizeSpeed
data.value: Adjusts the size speed of the shape.

data.name: SizeSpeedVariation
data.value: Randomly adjust the size speed around the size speed level by the amount of variation.

data.name: SkipPoints
data.value: Adjusts the skip point for star.

data.name: StarInsideSize
data.value: Adjusts inside radius of Star.

data.name: StarPoints
data.value: Adjusts the number of points on the star.

data.name: StrokeFill
data.value: Shows the shape outline.

data.name: StrokeWidth
data.value: Adjusts the thickness of the shape outline.

data.name: CenterSize
data.value: Randomly adjust the Shape size around the Size level by the amount of variation.

data.name: SizeChange
data.value: Enable increase/decrease of shape size based on size variation.

data.name: SizeVariation
data.value: Randomly adjust the shape size around the size level by the amount of variation.

data.name: RandomSize
data.value: Randomly adjust the shape size.

data.name: AllowMarkGaps
data.value: When selected, the effect does not fill gaps in the marks with a REST.

data.name: SizeMode
data.value: Determines how the shapes size changes.

data.name: StretchToGrid
data.value: Adjusts image dimensions to fit the grid size.

data.name: CycleColor
data.value: Will cycle through gradient colors for each word.

data.name: PerIteration
data.value: Enabled will adjust movement per number where as disabled adjusts movement over effect length.

data.name: CountDownSizeMode
data.value: Vary the size of the Count down value.

data.name: Quality
data.value: Higher the value will result in higher quality but slower render time.

data.name: Density
data.value: Adjust the density of the elements.

data.name: DissolveFlip
data.value: Flips the direction of the sequential dissolve.

data.name: DissolveMarkCollection
data.value: The Mark Collection to align changes to the Dissolve pattern.

data.name: GroupColors
data.value: Each element will have all colors generated in parallel.

data.name: MarkType
data.value: Can use the Marks to determine how the effect is rendered.

data.name: RandomColorOrder
data.value: Generates colors in a random order from teh Color collection.

data.name: RandomDissolve
data.value: Generates a random or sequential Dissolve.

data.name: StartingElement
data.value: Starting location were the Dissolve or Fill will commence from.

data.name: TimingSource
data.value: Selects what source is used to determine change.

data.name: BothDirections
data.value: Dissolves or fills the element in both directions one after another.

data.name: DirectionsTogether
data.value: Dissolves or fills the element in both directions at the same time.

data.name: CountPerString
data.value: Generates Meteors for each string.

data.name: FlipDirection
data.value: Will Flip the direction the Meteor moves.

data.name: MeteorPerString
data.value: Generates Meteors per string.

data.name: StartPosition
data.value: Determines where the Meteors will start from.

data.name: OffsetPercentage
data.value: When enabled will convert the Offsets to percentage of Buffer size. Once enabled the option will be hidden as this is the updated method.

data.name: CycleTime
data.value: The amount of time in milliseconds for one complete on and off cycle.

data.name: CycleVariation
data.value: Alters the cycle time as a percentage of the Cycle Time parameter above. Used to vary the strobe speed over time.

data.name: OnTime
data.value: The percentage of each on/off cycle that the effect is on.

data.name: StrobeMarkCollection
data.value: The Mark Collection to adjust the strobe cycle time based on Mark label value or label duration. When Mark collection label value is selected the label must have a value or a default of 150ms will be used.

data.name: StrobeMode
data.value: Enables Simple or Advanced Strobe control.

data.name: StrobeSource
data.value: Selects what source is used to determine change.
